attributes.action: Amend the SOA 2003 to correctly label Female on Male rape cases.
attributes.additional_details:
Area of the law in question: http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2003/42/notes/division/5/1/1

Sexual assault has been evidenced numerous times as carrying a lighter sentence than rape. In either situation, ceteris paribus, the punishment should be equal.
attributes.background:
Currently Female on Male cases are only classified as ‘Sexual Assault’, rather than their true classification of rape. 

As defined in the dictionary:
“unlawful sexual intercourse ... by a sex organ, other body part, or foreign object, ... without the consent of the victim”
